de.hshl.obj.loader

Class MTLLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshl.obj.loader.MTLLoader

  • public final class MTLLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Load MTL files into an MTL object.
    See Also:
    load(Resource)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MTLLoader() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MTL buildMTL(MTL mtl)
      Loads the MTL file into the specified MTL object using its resource environment and its name.
      MTL load(Resource resource)
      Open the MTL file and convert the data into an MTL object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MTLLoader

        public MTLLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • buildMTL

        public static MTL buildMTL(MTL mtl)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the MTL file into the specified MTL object using its resource environment and its name.
        Parameters:
        mtl - The object which will be filled with information
        Returns:
        The parameter, which has been filled with information.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for any file-related errors.
        DecodingException - for content errors.

      • load

        public MTL load(Resource resource)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Open the MTL file and convert the data into an MTL object. Any MTL property which was not found in the file will be null.
        Parameters:
        resource - The file to read
        Returns:
        The data from the MTL file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while processing the file
